content.question: Political statements such as the excerpt most directly culminated in which of the following?

choices.label: The emergence of evangelical Christians as a political force in the United States
The creation of a national energy policy to limit the influence of oil-producing countries on the United States
The establishment of political institutions meant to reduce environmental pollution
The growth in opposition to United States foreign policies by many groups on the political left

content.answer: The growth in opposition to United States foreign policies by many groups on the political left

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
